title: Pizza John’s Recalls Pepperoni Pizza Products Produced Without Benefit of Inspection
summary: EDITOR'S NOTE: Sept. 1, 2022 — This release and product labels have been updated with a correction to one UPC code. “958939019” has been updated to “9589339019.” WASHINGTON, August 25, 2022 – Pizza John’s, an Essex, Md. firm, is recalling approximately 156,498 pounds of pepperoni...
impacted_products: 33.25-oz. clear plastic wrapped packages containing “PIZZA JOHN’S BAKE AT HOME 12 Inch Pepperoni Pizza” with UPC code 9589334921.
57-oz. clear plastic wrapped packages containing “PIZZA JOHN’S BAKE AT HOME 16 Inch Pepperoni Pizza” with UPC code 958939019.
